title: For Ohmwrecker!!!

replies.body: You could argue that ohm wrecker saves you from a few tower hits, arguably buying a warmogs giving you a fat chunk of health would also save you for a few turret hits and is far less situational. I think the game should give this niche back to poppy though... Or maybe give an item that has a passive like *Sturdy Defence* - Turret hits do not amplify with subsequent hits. Lazers do not slow you. (Or something of that nature), because I don't know about you but I'm constantly running around with 2-3 items with actives on them and I think every item is turning into an active nowadays. Let items be items.

I agree with you on the too many actives thing. Two I can handle alright, but 3 starts to get a bit much xD
Ohmwrecker active is not something you use constantly in fights unless you're sieging a lot though so I think it's ok.
Or maybe throw that as an additional effect onto randuins so it's more than just an anti crit item piece and yeah has some sort of dual functionality.
